word: EVENTS QUICKLY FOLLOWED WHICH LED ELDER DANIELLS TO HEED ELLEN WHITE'S COUNSEL AND LED HIM TO ENGAGE FOR A TIME IN CITY EVANGELISM AND CHANGED HIS VIEWPOINT. TWO YEARS LATER, WHEN ELLEN WHITE APPOINTED FIVE TRUSTEES TO TAKE CHARGE OF HER WRITINGS ON HER DEATH, DANIELLS WAS ONE NAMED BY HER TO CARRY THAT RESPONSIBILITY.--ALW.]
